\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% <https://q.uiver.app/#>
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
\& {\ \boxed{A \ \ B}\, \, \boxed{C}\, \, \boxed{D}} \\
{\ \boxed{A} \, \, \boxed{B}\, \, \boxed{C}\, \, \boxed{D}} \&\& {\ \boxed{A \ \ B \ \ C}\, \, \boxed{D}}
\arrow["{B \sim C}", curve={height=-12pt}, from=1-2, to=2-3]
\arrow["{A \sim B}", curve={height=-12pt}, from=2-1, to=1-2]
\arrow["{A \sim B , B \sim C}"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
